title: Roasted Garlic Chicken Salad
directions: . Mix Mayonnaise with all powder ingredients (garlic powder, paprika, black pepper, salt)
Chop up red pepper and red onion into a small dice
Cube chicken breast into 1/2 inch size cubes
Mix all ingredients together and top with sprinkled parsley, serve chilled
ingredients: 2 lb Chicken Breast cooked and cubed
1/4 Cup mayonnaise- use my garlic mayonnaise recipe See Below
